com.trial.phonegap.plugin.calendar
Class CalendarAccessorCreator

java.lang.Object
  com.trial.phonegap.plugin.calendar.CalendarAccessorCreator
Direct Known Subclasses:
CalendarAccessorGoogle, CalendarAccessorMock
public abstract class CalendarAccessorCreator
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class defines an API for communication with Calendar APIS like Google Yahoo, native apks etc. The class is in charge of creating an instance of a class implementing this API. To create the instance there are two options. Either Passing a string with the name of the class or use a method to create a default instance The implementations of this class must working with JSON for communication with javaScript plugin

find

public abstract org.json.JSONArray find(org.json.JSONObject options)
This method finds the calendar events matching with the options given by parameter, and returns a JSONArray with the events found.

Parameters:
options - The options are a JSONObject with the following String fields: - startBefore: events that start before this date - startAfter: events that start after this date - endBefore: events that end before this date - endAfter: events that end after this date The union of all fields is a great filter for finding the events
Returns:
A JSONArray object with the events calendar found

save

public abstract boolean save(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
This method save a calendar event given by parameter. The method is used either to update or create one event.

Parameters:
jsonObject - Is a JSONObject object with all calendar event fields.
Returns:
A boolean with the success of the method.
See Also:
calendar.js
